title: For you madam. [No. 67/12] = Pour vous madame
brief_description: Cinemagazine items including: 1. Showcasing the lastest fashion trends and accessories for women. 2. Latest changes in modern art by women artists. 3. Newest pop music sensation, Sylvie Vartan.
